sentences: Marvin Jones III (born July 9, 1976), also known as Krondon,  is an American rapper and actor from Los Angeles, California.
Jones grew up in South Central, Los Angeles.
Krondon's debut album, Everythingâ€™s Nothing, came out in 2013.
Krondon collaborated with Shafiq Husayn (Sa-Ra Creative Partners) under the group name White Boiz, releasing the 2015 album Neighborhood Wonderful on Stones Throw Records.
